abstract: New York law firm Cravath Swaine & Moore says it was victim of 'limited breach' of its computer network in mid-2015; Federal Bureau of Investigation has warned law firms about hackers since 2011.

headline.print_headline: Cravath Discloses Breach, Saying It Was ‘Limited’
headline.main: Cravath Law Firm Discloses a Data Attack

snippet: The disclosure by Cravath Swaine & Moore, which reported a “limited breach” of its computer network last summer, is rare for a big law firm.
lead_paragraph: The disclosure by Cravath Swaine & Moore, which reported a “limited breach” of its computer network last summer, is rare for a big law firm.
